name: It Eats
description:
Description: 

“It Eats” is a game about a floating island and its mysterious residents. The goal of the game is to uncover the mysteries hidden by said residents, and finding a way to outsmart the island in order to escape this floating prison. As you make deliveries, you will uncover stories, unlock NPC interactions and maybe, become one of them. This RPG game is more than what it seems at first. 

Controls: 

W, A, S, D  -- To move

Space  -- To jump

Shift -- To run 

Mouse -- To look around 

E -- To interact 

Q -- To continue dialogue
